title: santAna sarOrava
sahitya:
santAna sarOrava tIradalli ninta kari krSNarAya ninage namisuvenu


caraNam 1    antarangadallidda aghagaLa kaLedu santAna saubhAgya koDuva dInabandhu
    caraNam 2    vrndA caraNadalli nanda vAlmIkadalli candadi mEsudidda allinda banda dore
    caraNam 3    aNdaja vAhanane kuNDali shayanane puNDarIkAkSa shrI purandara viTTalane
